description:
Finamp is a music player for Jellyfin. Finamp is a Jellyfin music player for Android and iOS. Its main feature is the ability to download songs for offline listening. Translations Finamp uses Weblate to manage translations: https://hosted.weblate.org/engage/finamp/ Feel free to add new languages if yours isn't there yet. If you have any questions, such as the context of a string, you can ask in the Translation Discussions (https://github.com/jmshrv/finamp/discussions/categories/translations). Known Issues This app is still a work in progress, and has some bugs/issues that haven't been fixed yet. Here is a list of currently known issues:
  • Deleting large items (such as playlists) will cause the app to freeze for a few seconds
  • Download indicators occasionally don't update
    • Planned Features
  • Transcoding support for downloads
  • Multiple users/servers
  • Translation support
    • Name source: https://www.reddit.com/r/jellyfin/comments/hjxshn/jellyamp_crossplatform_desktop_music_player/fwqs5i0/
